pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 15, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 15, 2016:

Waterloo, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Ministers Duncan and Chagger at the Perimeter Institute for Theoretical Physics and will hold a media availability.

Perimeter Institute for Theoretical Physics
31 Caroline Street North
Waterloo, Ontario

Note for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


Cambridge, Ontario

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour Canadian General-Tower Limited.

Canadian General-Tower Limited
52 Middleton Street
Cambridge, Ontario

Notes for Media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.


Media appearance

News at Noon, CTV Kitchener

12:00 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
